verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O my Savior, glorified! Now the heavens, opened wide, Show to faith’s exultant eye One in beauteous majesty.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Worthy of the sweetest praise That my ransomed heart can raise, Is that Man in whom alone God Himself is fully known.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For those clust’ring glories prove That glad gospel, “God is Love,” Whilst those wounds, in glory bright. Voice the solemn, “God is Light.”{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O my Savior, glorified, Turn my eye from all beside, Let me but Thy beauty see, Other light is dark to me.{/lang-eng}
